anathema: Ruin a holiday, quarrel at a feast, ignore workers when celebrating
edict: Celebrate freely, share prosperity, invite all to your table
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Thisamet (The Blithe Spirit)](/Deities.aspx?ID=655)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 12

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Celebrate freely, share prosperity, invite all to your table

**Anathema** Ruin a holiday, quarrel at a feast, ignore workers when celebrating

**Area of Concern**
Celebrations, feasts, and holidays

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)

**Favored Weapon** [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=398)

**Domains** [Cities](/Domains.aspx?ID=66), [Disorientation](/Domains.aspx?ID=105), [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=79), [Wealth](/Domains.aspx?ID=99)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=76)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Dizzying Colors](/Spells.aspx?ID=1500)

- **3rd**
[Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=1516)

- **5th**
[Cloak of Colors](/Spells.aspx?ID=1977)

</column>
name: Thisamet (The Blithe Spirit)
